original_text: Jesus told the people that they must not tell anyone about this. But every time Jesus asked them not to say anything, they spoke even more about it.
korean_text: 예수께서 그들에게 경고하사 아무에게도 이르지 말라 하시되 경고하실수록 그들이 더욱 널리 전파하니

sentences.original_text: that they must not tell anyone about this
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 이것에 대해 아무에게도 말해서는 안 된다고

sentences.original_text: But every time Jesus asked them
they spoke even more about it
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그것에 대해 더욱 더 말했다
